name: Lampshade
description:
Please be aware that this is a very weird, experimental game. In parts, it requires you to be very alert and attentive. It will also require you to memorize things you see. In parts, unless you have an amazing memory, it will probably even be necessary for you to write things down as you play in order to remember them for later in the game.

You move with the arrow keys or WASD.
If you want to reset your save file just start the game in the main menu by pressing instead of SPACE.
If you click outside of the game area, it will pause automatically.

The music was done by Mark Sparling and Calamaistr.
